metadata.description: Test psychology training data for demo pipeline

items.content: Client presents with persistent worry and physical symptoms of anxiety including rapid heartbeat and sweating.
items.intervention: Cognitive behavioral therapy focusing on thought restructuring and relaxation techniques.
items.outcome: Significant reduction in anxiety symptoms after 12 sessions.

items.content: Patient experiences panic attacks with intense fear and physical discomfort lasting 10-15 minutes.
items.intervention: Panic-focused CBT with exposure therapy and breathing exercises.
items.outcome: Decreased frequency of panic attacks from daily to weekly occurrences.

items.content: Client reports persistent sadness, loss of interest in activities, and sleep disturbances for 6 weeks.
items.intervention: Combination of cognitive therapy and behavioral activation techniques.
items.outcome: Gradual improvement in mood and activity level over 8 weeks of treatment.

items.content: Patient exhibits alternating periods of elevated mood and depression with impaired functioning.
items.intervention: Mood stabilization therapy with psychoeducation and lifestyle modifications.
items.outcome: Stabilized mood episodes with improved medication compliance.

items.content: Veteran presents with intrusive memories, nightmares, and hypervigilance following combat exposure.
items.intervention: Trauma-focused CBT with EMDR processing of traumatic memories.
items.outcome: Reduced PTSD symptoms and improved sleep quality after 16 sessions.

items.content: Survivor of childhood abuse exhibits dissociative symptoms and emotional dysregulation.
items.intervention: Phase-oriented trauma treatment with grounding techniques and emotional regulation skills.
items.outcome: Decreased dissociative episodes and improved emotional stability.
